text: Vicente Sota Barros (28 April 1924 - 16 August 2017) was a Chilean politician. He was born in Talca, Chile. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Party until, switching as a member of the Party for Democracy from 1987, until his death in 2017. Sota served as Deputy President of the Chamber of Deputies from 1965 to 1969 and again from 1990 to 1998. He served as President of the Chamber of Deputies from 1994 to 1995. Sota died on 16 August 2017, in Santiago de Chile at the age of 93.A los 93 a√±os muere Vicente Sota ex diputado por Melipilla y Talagante ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography of Vicente Sota at the National Congressional Library of Chile Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies of Chile
